arts.ttl: Southampton defender Kyle Walker-Peters seen as alternative for Galatasaray – On their wish list
arts.sum: According to a claim in the Turkish media, Galatasaray are showing interest in Southampton defender Kyle Walker-Peters. Galatasaray’s issues at right back have been well documented in recent months and subsequently they’ve turned their attention to the Saints player. Galatasaray journalist Kağan Dursun has spoken to Haber Sarikirmizi about possible arrivals at the club in The post Southampton defender Kyle Walker-Peters seen as alternative for Galatasaray – On their wish list appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray 23-24 100th Anniversary of Turkish Republic Kit Leaked
arts.sum: In October 2023, Galarasay introduced a special jersey to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the Turkish Republic.
